question: This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
This character is known for their alias 'O-Nami' and their ability to manipulate weather, often seen with a weapon called the 'Clima-Tact'. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
This member of the Worst Generation, known for their 'Room' ability and Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit, is a notorious pirate and surgeon. Who is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This character, known as 'The Surgeon of Death', is the captain of the Heart Pirates and possesses the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This leader of the Beasts Pirates, known for his immense strength and Dragon-Dragon Fruit power, is one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Who is...?
This character, known for their love of sweets and terrifying ability to manipulate souls, rules over Whole Cake Island. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This revolutionary is known for his crow zone ability and efforts to overthrow the World Government. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, is known for his string-string fruit powers and role as a former Warlord of the Sea. Who is...?
This character is a former fleet admiral of the Marines, known for his ice powers and strict sense of justice. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled cook and martial artist, known for his kicks and dream of finding the All Blue. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Hawk Eyes', is a master swordsman and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Who is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This vice admiral of the Marines is known for his loud voice and the power of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
This character is the leader of the Whitebeard Pirates and was known as the 'Strongest Man in the World'. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This commander of the Revolutionary Army's eastern forces is known for her ability to turn her body into art. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his shadow-shadow fruit powers and large, looming presence. Who is...?
This character, the former captain of the Heart Pirates, is known for his ability to grant eternal youth with the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This new character, a skilled samurai and one of the Nine Red Scabbards, is known for their mastery of the Nitoryu style. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a musician known for his long nose and ability to create powerful sound-based attacks. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
This former captain of the Sun Pirates and fish-man is known for his tragic past and his nickname 'Jinbe the Knight of the Sea'. Who is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Black Leg', is the Straw Hat Pirates' chef and a master of Black Leg Style martial arts. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a reindeer with the ability to transform into different forms using the Human-Human Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This character, the captain of the Heart Pirates and a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates, is known for his surgical skills and the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit. Who is...?
